description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国广东省广州市的地方国家监察机关，与中国共产党广州市纪律检查委员会合署办公。
description.en: The local state supervisory organ of Guangzhou, Guangdong Province, People's Republic of China, which works jointly with the Guangzhou Municipal Commission for Discipline Inspection of the CPC.

nodes.id: 中国共产党广州市纪律检查委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党广州市纪律检查委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在广州市的纪律检查机关，与广州市监察委员会合署办公。
description.en: The discipline inspection organ of the Communist Party of China in Guangzhou, which works jointly with the Guangzhou Municipal Supervisory Commission.

description.zh-cn: 时任广州市监察委员会主任。
description.en: Serving as the Director of the Guangzhou Municipal Supervisory Commission.

description.zh-cn: 时任广州市监察委员会副主任。
description.en: Serving as a Deputy Director of the Guangzhou Municipal Supervisory Commission.

description.zh-cn: 时任广州市监察委员会副主任。
description.en: Serving as a Deputy Director of the Guangzhou Municipal Supervisory Commission.

description.zh-cn: 时任广州市监察委员会委员。
description.en: Serving as a member of the Guangzhou Municipal Supervisory Commission.

description.zh-cn: 时任广州市监察委员会委员。
description.en: Serving as a member of the Guangzhou Municipal Supervisory Commission.

description.zh-cn: 时任广州市监察委员会委员。
description.en: Serving as a member of the Guangzhou Municipal Supervisory Commission.

description.zh-cn: 时任广州市监察委员会委员。
description.en: Serving as a member of the Guangzhou Municipal Supervisory Commission.

description.zh-cn: 广州市监察委员会的前身机构。
description.en: The predecessor body of the Guangzhou Municipal Supervisory Commission.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国广东省的国家监察机关，是广州市监察委员会的业务上级。
description.en: The state supervisory organ of Guangdong Province, People's Republic of China, and the professional superior of the Guangzhou Municipal Supervisory Commission.

description.zh-cn: 广州市的国家权力机关，选举产生广州市监察委员会主任。
description.en: The state organ of power in Guangzhou, which elects the director of the Guangzhou Municipal Supervisory Commission.

nodes.id: 广州市人民代表大会常务委员会

zh-cn: 广州市人民代表大会常务委员会

description.zh-cn: 广州市人民代表大会的常设机关，广州市监察委员会向其负责。
description.en: The standing committee of the Guangzhou Municipal People's Congress, to which the Guangzhou Municipal Supervisory Commission is accountable.

nodes.id: 中国共产党广东省纪律检查委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党广东省纪律检查委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在广东省的纪律检查机关，是中国共产党广州市纪律检查委员会的上级。
description.en: The discipline inspection organ of the Communist Party of China in Guangdong Province, and the superior of the Guangzhou Municipal Commission for Discipline Inspection.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国国家监察机关

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国家监察机关

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国负责行使国家监察职能的专责机关的统称。
description.en: A collective term for the specialized organs responsible for exercising state supervisory functions in the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国各级监察委员会

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国各级监察委员会

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国家监察机关的具体组织形式，包括国家、省、市、县四级监察委员会。
description.en: The specific organizational form of the state supervisory organs of the People's Republic of China, including supervisory commissions at the national, provincial, municipal, and county levels.

description.zh-cn: 杨飞在第十六届广州市人大任期内担任广州市监察委员会主任。
description.en: Yang Fei serves as the Director of the Guangzhou Municipal Supervisory Commission during the term of the 16th Guangzhou Municipal People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 余向阳在第十六届广州市人大任期内担任广州市监察委员会副主任。
description.en: Yu Xiangyang serves as a Deputy Director of the Guangzhou Municipal Supervisory Commission during the term of the 16th Guangzhou Municipal People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 冯慧光在第十六届广州市人大任期内担任广州市监察委员会副主任。
description.en: Feng Huiguang serves as a Deputy Director of the Guangzhou Municipal Supervisory Commission during the term of the 16th Guangzhou Municipal People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 刘利人在第十六届广州市人大任期内担任广州市监察委员会委员。
description.en: Liu Liren serves as a member of the Guangzhou Municipal Supervisory Commission during the term of the 16th Guangzhou Municipal People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 王普华在第十六届广州市人大任期内担任广州市监察委员会委员。
description.en: Wang Puhua serves as a member of the Guangzhou Municipal Supervisory Commission during the term of the 16th Guangzhou Municipal People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 朱永飞在第十六届广州市人大任期内担任广州市监察委员会委员。
description.en: Zhu Yongfei serves as a member of the Guangzhou Municipal Supervisory Commission during the term of the 16th Guangzhou Municipal People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 林钰泽在第十六届广州市人大任期内担任广州市监察委员会委员。
description.en: Lin Yuze serves as a member of the Guangzhou Municipal Supervisory Commission during the term of the 16th Guangzhou Municipal People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 广州市监察委员会于2018年1月16日成立，取代了广州市监察局的职能。
description.en: The Guangzhou Municipal Supervisory Commission was established on January 16, 2018, replacing the functions of the Guangzhou Municipal Bureau of Supervision.

description.zh-cn: 广州市监察委员会是广东省监察委员会的业务下级，并向其负责。
description.en: The Guangzhou Municipal Supervisory Commission is professionally subordinate to the Guangdong Provincial Supervisory Commission and is accountable to it.

description.zh-cn: 广州市监察委员会是广州市人民代表大会的组织下级，由其选举产生并向其负责。
description.en: The Guangzhou Municipal Supervisory Commission is organizationally subordinate to the Guangzhou Municipal People's Congress, by which it is elected and to which it is accountable.

relationships.target: 广州市人民代表大会常务委员会

description.zh-cn: 广州市监察委员会是广州市人民代表大会常务委员会的组织下级，并向其负责。
description.en: The Guangzhou Municipal Supervisory Commission is organizationally subordinate to the Standing Committee of the Guangzhou Municipal People's Congress and is accountable to it.

relationships.source: 中国共产党广州市纪律检查委员会
relationships.target: 中国共产党广东省纪律检查委员会

description.zh-cn: 根据中国共产党的组织原则，广州市纪委是广东省纪委的下级单位。
description.en: According to the organizational principles of the Communist Party of China, the Guangzhou Municipal Commission for Discipline Inspection is a subordinate unit of the Guangdong Provincial Commission for Discipline Inspection.

relationships.target: 中国共产党广州市纪律检查委员会

description.zh-cn: 广州市监察委员会与中国共产党广州市纪律检查委员会合署办公，实行一套工作机构、两个机关名称的体制。
description.en: The Guangzhou Municipal Supervisory Commission and the Guangzhou Municipal Commission for Discipline Inspection of the CPC work jointly, operating as one working body under two names.

description.zh-cn: 广州市人民代表大会选举产生广州市监察委员会主任杨飞。
description.en: The Guangzhou Municipal People's Congress elects Yang Fei as the Director of the Guangzhou Municipal Supervisory Commission.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国国家监察机关

description.zh-cn: 广州市监察委员会是中华人民共和国的国家监察机关之一。
description.en: The Guangzhou Municipal Supervisory Commission is one of the state supervisory organs of the People's Republic of China.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国各级监察委员会

description.zh-cn: 广州市监察委员会属于中华人民共和国各级监察委员会中的市一级监察委员会。
description.en: The Guangzhou Municipal Supervisory Commission is a municipal-level commission among the supervisory commissions at all levels in the People's Republic of China.
